patthana23.4:1.1: Nakusalaṃ nasaṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesikaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā akusalo saṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā …. (Akusalāneva tīṇi. Saṃkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
patthana23.4:2.1: Nakusalaṃ naasaṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesikaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato asaṃkiliṭṭhaasaṃkilesiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā cha, adhipatiyā cha …pe… vipāke tīṇi …pe… avigate pañca.
patthana23.4:3.1: Nakusalaṃ naasaṃkiliṭṭhaasaṃkilesikaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā kusalo asaṃkiliṭṭhaasaṃkilesiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā cha, ārammaṇe cha …pe… āsevane tīṇi …pe… vipāke tīṇi …pe… avigate cha.
